title: Social Domain Competency Enhancement Program via Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Emphasis on developing practical competencies through collaborative learning environments using digital devices and solving real-world social issues.

learning_goals: Learners can establish systematic problem-solving strategies in three or more stages through analysis of presented social issue cases
Learners can propose solutions to real-world social challenges based on knowledge acquired during the PBL process
Learners can revise the problem-solving process two or more times incorporating peer feedback and submit the final output

resources: Digital Collaboration Tools (Google Workspace, Miro, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
